animation-time.tooltip: The time it takes to flip from one preview to the next

offset.tooltip: Negative value moves everything down, positive up

title-position.tooltip: Where to display the window title

icon-style.tooltip: How the window icon is displayed

switcher-style.tooltip: How the window switcher arranges the preview

hide-panel.tooltip: Check to hide the panels, uncheck to show the panels when the switcher is active

enforce-primary-monitor.description: Always show the switcher on the primary monitor
enforce-primary-monitor.tooltip: Show the switcher on the primary monitor instead of detecting the active monitor

elastic-mode.tooltip: Use elastic animation style when toggling switcher

current-workspace-only.description: Show windows from current or all workspaces
current-workspace-only.tooltip: Whether to show windows from current workspace only or all workspaces
